name: fusion2-detect-videos
Command: cd ~/code/yolov5/;~/miniconda3/envs/yolov5/bin/python detect_modified.py --source video/测试集视频 --imgsz 1280 --data data/qianhai_clean_add0616_public_bdd100k.yaml --weights runs/train/fusion2/weights/best.pt --device 0 --name 测试集视频 --exist-ok --conf-thres 0.4 --line-thickness 1
